data.comment: The match is underway at De Oude Meerdijk.
Goal! Sittard have got their heads in front thanks to a Sebastian Polter strike.
In the minute 18, Great play from Lisandro Semedo to set up the goal.
Goal! Lisandro Semedo extends Sittard's lead to 0-2.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Ricardo Van Rhijn is on a sub for Nick Bakker for Emmen.
Emmen are back in the match in Emmen. Nikolai Laursen has scored to make it 1-2.
In the minute 60, Michael de Leeuw levels the score at 2-2.
Caner Cavlan instrumental with a fine assist.
Dick Lukkien (Emmen) is making a second change, with Robbert de Vos replacing the possibly injured Anco Jansen.
In the minute 73, Emmen's Simon Tibbling has been booked in Emmen.
Mats Seuntjens (Sittard) gets a yellow card.
Kevin Hofland is making the team's first substitution at De Oude Meerdijk with Emil Hansson replacing Lisandro Semedo.
In the minute 85, Sergio Pena for Emmen has been booked by Serdar Gozubuyuk and receives a first yellow card.
